channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brush Fires Break Out on Long Island, Prompting Highway Closure
item.description: Long Island and the Hudson Valley faced a high fire risk on Sunday, officials said, as firefighters battled the last of four blazes that began in Suff...

item.title: FEMA cancels classes at national fire training academy amid federal funding cuts
item.description: "It’s not a ‘nice to have.’ It is the one avenue we have to bring people from all over the country to learn from and with each other."

item.title: Violence Sweeps Coastal Syria, Sowing Chaos: ‘We Have to Get Out of Here’
item.description: Residents described shootings outside their homes and bodies in the streets in Syria’s worst unrest since Bashar al-Assad’s ouster. More than 1,000 pe...

item.title: MeidasTouch Pops on Podcast Charts as Progressives Search for Answers
item.description: The company is a leader among numerous digital-first outlets that have been reshaping the progressive media landscape since President Trump took offic...

item.title: Canada’s Liberal Party To Elect New Leader and Prime Minister to Replace Trudeau: What to Know
item.description: Front-runner Mark Carney and underdog Chrystia Freeland, both established, centrist policymakers, are vying to succeed Justin Trudeau amid grave threa...

item.title: Canada’s Liberal Party To Elect New Leader and Prime Minister to Replace Trudeau: What to Know
item.description: Front-runner Mark Carney and underdog Chrystia Freeland, both established, centrist policymakers, are vying to succeed Justin Trudeau amid grave threa...

item.title: A Political Reporter Takes Her Scoops to YouTube
item.description: Most online political media stars traffic in highly partisan viewpoints. Tara Palmeri hopes that playing it straight will pay off.

item.title: ChatGPT gets ‘anxiety’ from violent user inputs, so researchers are teaching the chatbot mindfulness techniques to ‘soothe’ it
item.description: A study on how to “calm down” chatbots could advance how AI is applied in mental health interventions, according to the authors.

item.title: Violence Sweeps Coastal Syria, Sowing Chaos: ‘We Have to Get Out of Here’
item.description: Residents described shootings outside their homes and bodies in the streets in Syria’s worst unrest since Bashar al-Assad’s ouster. More than 1,000 pe...

item.title: How a Copenhagen housing project by a $23 billion Novo-backed firm is rethinking big-city challenges like loneliness and access to sunlight
item.description: “If you want to address civilization and society's issues, then you have to do it with the city," Urban Partners' co-CEO Claus Mathisen said.

item.title: It’s not 40 hours—Gen Z don’t know how long they need to work in a week and even experts can’t decide
item.description: Google cofounder Sergey Brin told Gemini staffers a 60-hour workweek is the “sweet spot”—but experts say that’s outrageous. The answer isn’t 40 hours,...

item.title: Hundreds of Civilians Killed by Government Forces in Syria, War Monitors Say
item.description: More than 1,000 people have been killed in fighting between forces of the new government and remnants of the ousted regime, according to a war monitor...

item.title: Russia Pushes Back Ukraine’s Offensive With Drones and North Korean Troops
item.description: Russia has retaken about two-thirds of the territory Ukraine seized last summer in the Kursk region of Russia, but at a fearful cost in lives.

item.title: Plan to Return Russian Diplomats to U.S. Poses Espionage Risk
item.description: The Trump administration is negotiating the return of more Russian diplomats to the United States. Some are likely to be spies.

item.title: Gen Z students are rebelling against their parents’ Ivy League dream and choosing a different ideal university instead
item.description: MIT is students new No. 1 choice for college, but low acceptance rates and high tuition costs could kill that dream.
